channel.title: BattleScape Compiling Problem
channel.description:
I've done a forum search, and I've found several with the same problem, but havent found an answer.
I'm using BattleScape V2
When I use "Compile" I recieve this error:
'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue...
This is the command lines of the compiler when I open it to edit:
@echo off javac *.java pause
I currently have jdk6 update 3 and I have the latest JRE...
any help would be appreciated...

item.title: BattleScape Compiling Problem
item.dc:creator: @xXx_gl0wi_xXx xXx gl0wi xXx
item.description:
@xXx_gl0wi_xXx wrote:

lol hmm ,

put this in your compiler:

@echo off
COLOR 09
title Project Lazy Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Read full topic

item.title: BattleScape Compiling Problem
item.dc:creator: @Luvodicus Luvodicus
item.description:
@Luvodicus wrote:

I’ve done a forum search, and I’ve found several with the same problem, but havent found an answer.

I’m using BattleScape V2

When I use “Compile” I recieve this error:

‘javac’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
press any key to continue…

This is the command lines of the compiler when I open it to edit:

@echo off
javac *.java
pause

I currently have jdk6 update 3 and I have the latest JRE…

any help would be appreciated…
